title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Work With Us
body: Work With Us       Experience your America and build a fulfilling career by joining the National Park Service. Become a part of our mission to unite our past, our cultures and our special places, to establish important connections to the present and build a rich and lasting legacy for future generations. Permanent, Term, Temporary and Seasonal Positions All open government positions for Lake Mead National Recreation Area are posted on USAJOBS.gov.  Search open positions at Lake Mead National Recreation Area  Concessioners Concessioners are private companies that provide important services to park visitors such as boat rentals and marina services. They operate year-round and provide additional opportunities for employment in the park.  Las Vegas Boat Harbor/Lake Mead Marina Forever Resorts (Echo Bay Marina, Callville Bay Marina, Temple Bar Marina, Cottonwood Cove Marina) Lake Mead Cruises  Volunteer Positions There are many fun and exciting volunteer opportunities. Visit our Volunteer page for more information.
